resources.string: Welcome %1$s, you are connected to Flickr. You can now send photos from any photo application by selecting %2$s in the SENDTO dialog
Oops! Your authentication has expired. Please register again by clicking the \'Authorize Account\' button below.
Sorry, the request did not go through. Please try registering again by clicking the \'Authorize Account\' button below.
Welcome! Click the \'Authorize Account\' button to begin. In the browser window that opens, log into your account and authorize this app. Then return here to finish the process! Whew!
